description:
You guys are living in 2017
meanwhile this guy's living in 3017.

Tap to use the jetpack as you fly through the 3017 cityscape. You can go for a casual fly or do flips along the way, just watch out for the UFOs!

Rack up points as you dodge the buildings and UFOs, and try to beat your highscore.

Be warned though, not everyone has what it takes to be a 3017 resident. It takes mad skills and dedication, so be prepared!
